sn37.14:1.1: “Pañcahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo …pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati.
sn37.14:1.3: Pāṇātipātī ca hoti, adinnādāyī ca hoti, kāmesumicchācārī ca hoti, musāvādī ca hoti, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyī ca hoti—
sn37.14:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti.
